details:
Problem Description:
====================

Concurrent removals of such a mapping by using the UMTX\_SHM\_DESTROY
sub-request of UMTX\_OP\_SHM can lead to decreasing the reference
count of the object representing the mapping too many times, causing
it to be freed too early.

Impact:
=======

A malicious code exercizing the UMTX\_SHM\_DESTROY sub-request
in parallel can panic the kernel or enable further Use-After-Free
attacks, potentially including code execution or Capsicum sandbox
escape.
summary: FreeBSD -- umtx Kernel panic or Use-After-Free
